ProjectTitle: Homogeneous and heterogeneous metal-oxo clusters as a new generation of artificial metal-peptidases
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/06/2023
For data sharing, you need to describe what your plans are for sharing / publishing your research data. That is separate from your publications. Obviously your publications are based on your data, but you can also publish those data that underpin the papers, eg to enable replication.
KU Leuven RDR can be used for that: https://rdr.kuleuven.be/dataverse/rdr

In a data management plan you describe how you will manage and share your data (not the publications).

19/05/2023
As discussed with my colleagues Marc, please submit a revised version of the DMP addressing:
- data summary in more detail (individual datasets), including samples
- address sharing of data, eg RDR
label: good with suggestions
